short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension enables you to search on Discogs by text selected on a page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension provides a quick and simple way to navigate from videos and pages with music releases to searching those releases on Discogs helping you to save your precious time in cases when no direct link to the release is available. This is a tiny tool to assist your online digging.
